text: @realDonaldTrump #DumbDonnyDoLittle He thinks he has total control over the states, until it comes to responsibility. #America is now at the point where #Trump is having childish pissing contests w/various states & people who have been critical of him ... WHILE AMERICANS ARE DYING! #COVID19
